channel.title: Google on Corner case
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Corner case

item.title: Color labels in GMail
item.description: I supported it’s a cool new feature! Today I open GMail and found that a green box next to every label. You can select a color for each label by clicking that box. Then turn back to your inbox …

item.title: Keyborad Shortcuts Experient in Google Search
item.description: It’s interesting. I like the shortcuts J/K, just like working in VIM. more information here. But a big problem is that I have to select one kind of experient every time even with a login session. Is there any ways to let google remember my favoriate experimental selection?
